name: Sense Less
description:
Sense Less is a puzzle platformer created in about 5 days for the 2021 Global Game Jam. The theme was "lost and found". Recover your touch, hearing, smell, and sight by exploring an interconnected map.

Gameplay gifs here.

Jam page

Credits:

Everyone - Game Design

Massimo Gauthier - Programming

Alex Laliberté-Mercier - Level design, Playtesting

Jeremy Dumont - Art, Sound Design
